LanguageData.HiveBlowfly.label: Blowfly hive
LanguageData.HiveBlowfly.description: A hive of Blowfly. If activated, it will spawn additional insects and hives over time, as well as valuable insect jelly.
LanguageData.NestOfMonsters.label: Nest Of Monsters
LanguageData.NestOfMonsters.description: Contains Deathclaw eggs - deadly creatures ready to hatch at any moment.
LanguageData.NestOfRadScorpion.label: Nest Of RadScorpion
LanguageData.NestOfRadScorpion.description: Contains RadScorpion eggs - deadly creatures ready to hatch at any moment.
